permissions_info.title: Firestore Permissions
permissions_info.description: To use the Content Management System, you need to set up proper Firestore security rules. Here's how to do it:
permissions_info.setup_step1: Go to the Firebase Console for your project
permissions_info.setup_step3: Edit the rules to match your security requirements
permissions_info.custom_claims: Using Custom Claims for Admin Access
permissions_info.custom_claims_description: To give certain users admin privileges, you can set custom claims in Firebase Authentication. This requires setting up a Firebase Admin SDK function to set the claims.

roles.title: Roles
roles.name: Role Name
roles.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete role {name}? This action cannot be undone.
roles.firestore_rules_description: Role management is disabled when using Firestore security rules. Permissions are handled directly by Firebase.
roles.predefined_role_tooltip: Built-in role that cannot be modified

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: This page shows the auto-detected schema from your Firestore database, including any configured overrides. The schema is used to generate forms and validate data throughout the application.
schema.no_collections_desc: Create some documents in Firestore and refresh the schema to see collections here.
schema.collection_name_help: Must start with a letter and contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and slashes for subcollections (e.g., 'articles/comments')
schema.pro_required: Creating new collections is a Pro feature. Please upgrade to create collections.
schema.invalid_collection_name: Collection name must start with a letter and contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and slashes for subcollections
schema.parent_collection_not_found: Parent collection '{parentCollection}' does not exist. Please create the parent collection first.
schema.dropdown_options_help: List of options for the dropdown (e.g., 'admin, user, moderator')
schema.valid_types_help: Valid Types (select types allowed in this array):
schema.valid_types_unchecked_help: Leave all unchecked to allow any type in the array
schema.reset_override_tooltip: Reset to auto-detected schema (removes all customizations)
schema.confirm_reset_override: Are you sure you want to reset the schema for {collectionName}? This will remove all customizations and return to the auto-detected schema.

account.title: Account
account.features_desc: See which features are available with your current plan
account.free_plan_message: You're currently on the free plan. Upgrade to unlock Pro features.
account.license_instructions: Enter your Paddle subscription ID to activate Pro features.
account.license_save_error: Failed to save license. Please try again.
account.checkout_processing_failed: Payment was successful, but there was an error activating your subscription. Please contact support.
account.checkout_cancelled: Checkout was cancelled. You can try again anytime.

feature.schema_detection_desc: Automatic detection of Firestore schema with code-based configuration support
feature.content_management_desc: Full CRUD operations on your Firestore collections
feature.firebase_integration_desc: Direct integration with Firebase Authentication and Firestore
feature.assets_management_desc: Upload, organize and manage files in Firebase Storage
feature.unlimited_users_desc: No limits on the number of users who can access the admin
feature.visual_schema_editor_desc: Customize schema with GUI editor - no code required
feature.custom_roles_desc: Create and manage custom permission sets beyond built-in roles
feature.advanced_auth_desc: Phone, SAML, OIDC and other authentication methods beyond email/password
feature.custom_fields_desc: Define custom field types with renderInput, renderOutput and validation
